char0_msg_idle_000: Hu, seems that I have read too much, please let me sleep for a while.
char0_msg_idle_001: This book is interesting. Do you want to read as well?
char0_msg_idle_002: I have been reading book by myself, so I have few friends.
char0_msg_idle_003: As long as you are here, I somewhat become not that lonely.
char0_msg_idle_004: Recommended book? How about this “Ruby on rail tutorial”?
char0_msg_idle_005: Night is slient, I, like it.
char0_msg_idle_006: Because of the sandstorm, let’s read book in library.
char0_msg_idle_007: It’s hot outside, so let’s read book at bookstore.
char0_msg_idle_008: Autumn of reading, let’s go buying new books!
char0_msg_idle_009: It’s cold outside, so let’s read book at home!
char0_msg_idle_010: It’s about to the new year, how did you do this year?
char0_msg_idle_011: Happy new year! For not regret, just work hard this year!
char0_msg_idle_012: On Valentine’s day, I feel that I am dipped in special atmosphere.
char0_msg_idle_013: April Fool..., I am fooled by everyone every year.
char0_msg_idle_015: Sentence of Halloween? Uh... face or book?
char0_msg_idle_016: I prepared “Go Programming” as the present in the party, but everybody’s face became subtle, that’s strange.
char0_msg_idle_017: It’s weekend, are you going to travel to anywhere?
char0_msg_click_000: Where do you want to touch?
char0_msg_click_003: The glasses will be broken, please stop.
char0_msg_click_005: I am reading books, please wait for a while.
